channel.title: Is myxer illegal?
channel.description: Well, I rode the bus home and since I am getting a cell phone after school today, I was telling this one girl about myxer...you know, the site with music that can be put on your cell? Well, she said it was illegal. I don't think it is, as some songs are priced and some are free; depending on the author. So is it legal or not?

item.title: Is myxer illegal?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Alright cleaned the spam. Now shut up or answer his question.

If the music they provide for free is supposed to cost money (such as a track from an album) then it is illegal, depending on where you live. In my country it is legal to download all the copyrighted music you want, you just can’t upload.

Read full topic
